The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 10 February is 3,491,698 (6,203.4 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 05 February, there were 113,956 new confirmed cases (202.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 29 January, there were 151,983 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 25% (38,027 fewer cases).
